snippet: President Obama’s caution in resisting the opposition’s calls for military intervention and weapons remains the wise approach.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Pres Obama's decision to offer food rations and medical supplies to Syrian opposition while remaining cautious about calls for weapons aid and military intervention; holds  humanitarian aid alone is unlikely to challenge Pres Bashar al-Assad's position.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s caution in resisting the opposition’s calls for military intervention and weapons remains the wise approach.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
